body.name: KindGa Stove Cover - Stove Top Covers for Electric Stove, 28 x 20 Inch Stove Guard Stove Top Protector, Silicone Stovetop Cover Induction Cooktop Mat for Kitchen Glass Stove Top, Counter rv Stove

features: 【New Version - Advantages】: The new version of electric stove top cover has a groove structure with extra 5mm height design for rapid heat dissipation. Its unique design, coupled with convex ventilation, makes the stove mat heat-resistant up to 450 ° F. The glass cover is heat-resistant, so it can be used after the "hot surface" light is off 5 min but the top is still very hot, pay attention to no contact with open flame.

【Anti-scratch】: The stove cover can protect the glass stovetop from the influence of dirt, dust, stains and scratches, Everyone likes to place their things on stovetop, you don't need to worry about getting scratched on the new stove. Help you keep the stove surface clean even prevent your cat from getting scald.

【Extra Counter Space】: Perfect protection of the glass top, very heat-resistant, providing additional counter space for cooktop when preparing food and placing hot food. The anti slip layer keeps the stove top cover in place during use, flexible and easy to fold for storage. multi functional: can be used on kitchen countertops, dish drying mats, coffee machine mats, and bar mats.
【Easy to Clean】: The stove mat is very easy to clean and fast drying, quick and easy cleanup with a damp dish cloth or rinse with water in the sink , and can be machine washed with a dishwashe.

【Better After-sales Service】: We offer best quality assurance and if there is any problem or defect with the product, we offer you an exchange or full refund at any time. If you have any questions or problems, you can also contact us at any time and we will provide professional after-sales service and solutions.
body.description: Easy to clean Quick and easy cleanup with a damp dish cloth or rinse with water in the sink also that can be using machine wash. No contact with open flame. Wait 5 min after using stove mat, haven’t had any problems.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our stove top mat is a perfect size 20*28 Inches and lays flat, It keeps the top of stove protected from dirt, dust, smudges, and scratches. The grippy under side and heavy weight with 5mm thick , which keeps it from sliding around. also it's heat resistant, can safely place the crock pot or other kitchen tools on it without worry, that wonderful for creates extra more space. also this keeps the top of the range clean and safe while protecting users from high heat.Protects glass top and protects from hot surface when finished cooking.

Heat Resistant Protects glass top perfectly. groove structures design making heat dissipation quickly. Makes stove top into a good work surface. Resist heat up to 482 degrees F. Extra Thick 5mm Extra Height silicone mat. Well padded and thick enough that not afraid of setting a pan or dish on top of it and it won't scratch the cooktop underneath. Extra Large 20*28 Inches mat.Just make sure you measure your range top width and depth to get the right size.The quality of this product is impeccable. Perfectly sized to protect the stovetop, doesn’t slide around.

Easy to clean Quick and easy cleanup with a damp dish cloth or rinse with water in the sink also that can be using machine wash. No contact with open flame. Wait 5 min after using stove mat, haven’t had any problems. Features Heat restistant Premium grade silicone Easy to clean Dishwasher safe BPA Free Foldable Reusable Functional

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This thing is great. Protects my stove and you can fold in half to be able to use two of the burners. It is easy to clean and no more scratches on my stove top.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Can't do without it! It's flexible, durable and a glasstop lifesaver! Not sure why it is not pre-cut an inch or two closer to 30", but it effectively covers if centered. For a 30" glasstop stove, buying the larger size seems pointless just to cover the 1" edges not covered by this size. It provides a sort of extended counter for lightweight, temporary kitchen itens that otherwise might scratch or stain an unprotected glasstop. It also allows warm pots & pans to be moved around with no sliding or usual scraping of the glasstop. After cleaning my glasstop, this mat covers to prevent nearby splash stains that often make glasstops appear nasty or half cleaned. Crumbs & stains land on top of it, but it's so easy to pick up and clean. It maintains its dark appearance, as the heat dissipating pattern is both efficient & subtly attractive. Not cheaply made, and highly flexible. It's not too heavy, and easy to center for just the right amount of protection. No foul odor noted.Use Zeiss' 8oz mild glass Spray Cleaner liberally on glasstop to eliminate smears & stains seen in most videos. This mat cover protects smear-free sp gloss-top with ease!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Terrific Stove Cover
reviews.reviewText: I love this stove cover and so does everyone who comes to my house that has a glass stove top, enough that several of them have purchased the item after seeing mine. The cover protects the stove top and gives me extra space to work or dry additional dishes after a big dinner without worrying about the glass top. It easily folds away and is very lightweight to lift off the stove. I highly recommend this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Stovetop Cover
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to protect my cats from stepping on the hot flat stove. However, I actually love it because of the clean look. It hides the lines on the flat top. Very nice product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works for what I need.
reviews.reviewText: Not the prettiest option out there, but more financial practical for me. Keeps my glass top protected and extra working space without worrying about glass. Also, since it withstands hot temps, it helps with worry of cats sneaking up trying to jump on top of stove with still hot burners.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars More bang for the buck!
reviews.reviewText: Thick, easy to clean, has middle fold. you can fold over when only using several elements. Keep your glass top clean and free from being soiled. Well worth the price, and you get extra counter space when not using the burners. SUPER price and fast delivery by Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the stove protector
reviews.reviewText: It does cover my glass stove and it looks nice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Well made mat used to protect the surface of my glass top stove from scratches. I am very pleased with the easy of cleaning it as well as the fit and look.
